meanings.definition: Of or relating to the lips.
meanings.sent1: Her labial lipstick color matched her dress perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The labial balm kept her lips soft and moisturized.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his labial smile could charm anyone.
meanings.sent4: The labial touch of the breeze on her face felt refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The labial kiss on her cheek made her blush.

meanings.definition: A speech sound produced by the lips.
meanings.sent1: The 'p' sound is a labial produced by closing and opening the lips.
meanings.sent2: She practiced pronouncing labial sounds in her language class.
meanings.sent3: The labial sound of the kiss in the movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His labial whisper was barely audible in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The labial pop of the bubblegum made her jump.
